meanings.definition: The quality or state of being handsome.
meanings.sent1: His handsomeness caught everyone's attention at the party.
meanings.sent2: She admired his handsomeness whenever he smiled.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's handsomeness made everyone in the park smile.
meanings.sent4: The handsomeness of the sunset painted the sky in vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The handsomeness of the flower garden took her breath away.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being attractive or pleasing in appearance.
meanings.sent1: The handsomeness of the painting left the viewers in awe.
meanings.sent2: Her handsomeness was undeniable, drawing many admirers.
meanings.sent3: The handsomeness of the cake made it too beautiful to eat.
meanings.sent4: The handsomeness of the melody brought tears to her eyes.
meanings.sent5: The handsomeness of the mountain view was truly breathtaking.
